items.title: Show HN: Steerling-8B, a language model that can explain any token it generates
items.description: We release Steerling-8B, an 8B-parameter causal diffusion language model that is interpretable by construction — its predictions are routed through concepts you can measure, audit, and control.

items.title: Firefox 148 Launches with AI Kill Switch Feature and More Enhancements
items.description: The latest update of Firefox, version 148, introduces a much-anticipated "AI kill switch" feature, allowing users to disable AI functionalities such as chatbot prompts and AI-generated link summaries. Mozilla emphasizes that once AI features are turned off, future updates will not override
